Package model.pieces

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
model.pieces.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract class every Piece needs to inherit of

  • Constructor Details

    • Piece

      public Piece​(Color color, java.lang.String name, Field field, int value, char shortName)
      Default Constructor implemented for each Piece
      Parameters:
      color - color of Piece
      name - name of Piece("Black Queen, White Knight")
      field - Field Piece is on
      value - value of Piece Recommended for default Pieces Queen = 9 Rook = 5 Knight = Bishop = 3 Pawn = 1 King = 300
      shortName - single Char for Piece lowercase = Black uppercase = White 'n' or 'N' = Knight 'k' or 'K' = King 'q' or 'Q' = Queen 'r' or 'R' = Rook 'b' or 'B'= Bishop 'p' or 'P'= Pawn

  • Method Details

    • getMoves

      public abstract java.util.ArrayList<Field> getMoves()
      every Piece needs to Implement this method to indicate which moves it can make does not need to consider putting own King in check when calculating valid moves
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Fields
